author: Samuel Liebermann
comment: We use metric over here. What is 0.41 miles??? No fingerprint identification? The information on the map is plain stupid. Why not showing business category on the map, just blue and red pointers? Why not showing the business name when clicking the blue marker? Anyway, I think this reward plan is dead. List of businesses constantly dwindling.

author: L Keyser
comment: I would rate this higher but the readers in the stores are usually not working when I try to scan. But app works like a champ when the equipment in the stores work!
title: Equipment Issues

author: Julia Carlson
comment: It doesn't even let me sign on. Just says something went wrong, no matter if I try to sign in through Facebook, Google or email.
title: Loved this app but

author: Carmen Hooge
comment: Had to get this program after my local pet store switched reward programs for the third time, having lost all my previous points. My mother went into the store to pick something up for me and the owner rigidly refused to let her use it since it was my name on the account. Very frustrated by this.  policy and won't shop there again. Thanks, Belly. Because of your ridiculous rules you have alienated a local business from me.
title: Storefront issue (Urban Pets)

author: Tony Howell
comment: Not a fan of using location. Causes phone to suck up more data and battery. Also can't do anything with having to use data. Should be able to type in a location or address or the name of the restraunt and find it Even while off line like several other apps like this have. Also app does not say how many mbs it plans on installing. Also not much use for it around my area did a zip code search only 4 places have it. Also checked other areas around me all I have total is 9 places between 4 diffrent zip codes.

author: Nikki Miles
comment: This app crashes even when I'm not trying to open it. Back when it would open, it was fine.
title: Constantly crashing

author: Alvin
comment: Good idea, terrible app. Checked in and got the email for points, but the app refuses to update with the new points so it just stuck at 0 points and 0 visits. Making it worthless.
So far so good. But what do I do with the scan thing that popped up?

author: Stefan Houareau
comment: Great app... Free stuff for shopping & dining out. Points are still a bit confusing.

author: Renee Hale
comment: Great idea there is only one problem nothing is really on it around me. So I hope that will change soon because it an awesome idea .
title: Great Idea

author: Susan Price
comment: Nice to have the app especially when you can't find your card. Not sure I understand all the lingo tho.
title: Cool

author: Callum Robertson
comment: Terrible interface. Tells me I need to verify my account so I click the email and make a new password "Sorry there was an error". Figure your system out because this garbage experience makes me not want to use your app.

author: Cithlio Juarez
comment: I lost my card I had it for two years now all my points are gone I got new card I should just put my email in and my points should be there there not what's going on I need to no I should not have to do this TeX or call any place it should be on there when I put my email in all my points should be on it

author: Jewell Thomas
comment: What's not to love!! You visit places already...just take a few seconds to check in on the Belly app while you're there and earn free stuff.
title: Free stuff

comment: It doesn't work. Says can't connect to home feed, doesn't show a belly location where I got the card that is less than a mile away. It says it can't find any location near me.

author: Betty C
comment: Easy to use, just place phone up to scan. Shows all free food you can get.

author: Alex And Travis
comment: It's okay. Did some yelp reviews but never got the points for it. Idk if I have to wait for them though.

author: 1Pull Gardens
comment: My local bud dispensary uses Belly as their reward program. Its really easy to just go in, scan my card and check my account status on the fly. Much faster than the website.
title: Makes Rewards at my dispensary easy

author: Charlene Felix
comment: So easy to use...Open the app, scan the bar code when you're making a purchase and your points is added immediately.

author: Bobby Ritter
comment: Since 7 11 is no longer part of belly.  I have almost 3000 points. I can't do a dam thing with.  This used to be a great program.  And I've been loyal from the start.  Now,  no reward
title: Used to be great.

author: Kat LOLOLOLOL
comment: I have a BELLY mini card. And I don't know how to use it...?? It doesn't show us how to connect
title: Card

author: David Scott
comment: Makes it so much more convenient than carrying around yet another one of those stupid keyring cards that take up so much room with your keys.

author: Deborah Watson
comment: I just download this app on my cell phone, so therefore; i haven't used it yet but it was easy to download and im looking forward to start getting my points

author: Mark Cochran
comment: No way to create an account! So I will be deleting this app and going somewhere else!
title: Stupid!

author: Robert Shepherd
comment: Desert Organic Solutions has the best selection of medical Marijuana then any other local dispensery. The staff is very knowledgeable and helpful. Keep up the good work.
title: Belly

author: Celeste Devall
comment: I don't even know how many free things or discounts I've gotten from belly. All I know is this app is so helpful.
title: Awesome rewards

author: M Haney
comment: Signup failed, asked for new password multiple times and gets errors.

author: Trey Lee
comment: It's a great idea, but it crashes every time I try to access my settings.

author: Nick Fox
comment: Great app but when I go to redeem my points on my galaxy 7 it won't let me. The server and I tried for 15-20 minutes with no luck
title: Can't redeem my points

author: Lily Marleen
comment: Great for local business. I like the app a lot; I just wish more places used it!

author: Remedy Dean
comment: Nice reward system i wish you could chose if you just wanted points on flower products only

author: David Kraft
comment: I have no qualms with the phone app, but the Android Wear app crashes whenever I open it.

author: Tall Whitemail
comment: Just for adding your email when making a purchase, you get points towards free items. Simple and good.
title: Free Is Good!

author: Mark S Rieck
comment: Love the app , but this one place told me I can't use it cause I scan my card b to many times...

author: lillian calero
comment: Cool. With enough points I get free meals at the cafe near my job.

author: Brian Antrim
comment: Acquire Points just for being there. Use points for FREE items we are already purchasing. Hold on let me think it over

author: Patrick Bunch
comment: I like it. Tracks my Y visits and gives rewards at point levels!

author: Kartha Rose
comment: Some of the locations are incorrect but overall a great idea and application :)

author: Elisabeth Bugbee
comment: Most of the time the readers are not working therefore you can not get points. You should be able to sign in by location as well.
It's a great app! Points for just picking up meds, drop-off/pick-up for grooming, boarding, etc. It's just a show of appreciation,  and it's always appreciated being appreciated!
